body.content:
Thank you very much for your response.I assure you that this
transaction is 100% legitimate and you will not regret anything for
partnering with me in securing this fund. As a professional banker it
is my duty to ensure that the transaction is done in a quiet
manner,hence you will follow my instructions and act accordingly, to
enable everything work out smoothly. I will do everything legally
required to ensure that the transaction goes smoothly.

My friend,what i need from you is to provide an account where this
fund will be transferred into without any problem.The fund has been a
dormant

account and last Operated in the past (16) years.From investigations
and confirmations, the owner of this account is a American Foreigner
who died along with his supposed next of kin in a plane crash by name
Mr.George Brumley Jr.From Georgia Atlanta 68 years old.You don't have
to worry about anything, I’m here to feed you with the whole
information that will be required during the period of this
transaction,in as much as you obey my instructions.

According to Burkina Faso banking Law after the expiration of 18 years
if nobody applies for the claim it will be confiscated as state

treasury.That is why i contacted you so that we move it into useful
investments since no one knows about the money and no one will come
forward to claim the money as we already know.Frankly speaking, i have
been following up with the file of the deceased customer for the past
years now and i have seen that it is 100% possible for me to use my
office at my place of work (CORIS BANK) to claim this money through
the cooperation of a foreign partner since i cannot come out openly
for the claim because i am a staff of the same bank and Burkinabe
indigin.

I am a married man with 3 kids and have worked in the same bank for
several years now and be informed again on smooth conclusion of this
transaction,you will be entitled to 40% of the total sum as
gratification.Please,you should trust in me and in this transaction
just as i have trusted you before opening the secret of this business
to you and you have to follow my instruction so that there will be no
mistakes,i will require you to stand in as the next of kin of this

fund from the deceased customer to our bank here.

I will be waiting for your urgent response immediately with your full
Information.
Mr Alexandra.

On Wed, Aug 4, 2021 at 1:39 AM <eve@asdfghjkl.ovh> wrote:

> Hello,
> how can I help you with this?
>
> Sincerely
> Eve
>
>

header.subject: Re: How can i help with this?
